name: Tara Sringari
greetingText: I really like your name btw...
wishText: Hope your next year is full of positive energy and accomplishments
textInChatBox: How to wish a marketing baddie a happy birthday
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to be extra,
outroText: Okay, now dm me and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again. Or tell me where to send the invoice.
